mapper.insert: insert into pdm_product_info (product_id, product_name, product_type, product_description, client_name, deliver_name, deliver_time, producer, archive_personnel, produce_area, produce_time, deliver_method, data_process_step) values (#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{producer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archivePersonnel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{produceArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{produceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliverMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataProcessStep,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select product_id, product_name, product_type, product_description, client_name, deliver_name, deliver_time, producer, archive_personnel, produce_area, produce_time, deliver_method, data_process_step from pdm_product_info
